text: int main ( void ) { int i , j , t , n , min , * a , * optr ; scanf ( "%i" , & t ) ; optr = ( int * ) malloc ( t * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%i" , & n ) ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%i" , & a [ j ] ) ; if ( ! j ) min = a [ j ] ; else if ( a [ j ] < min ) min = a [ j ] ; } optr [ i ] = min * ( n - 1 ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) printf ( "%i\n" , optr [ i ] ) ; return 0 ; }
